name: Thunder Manifestation
title: "Lingering Hatred" Thunder Manifestation
desc: As long as the grudges of the land do not fade, so will the roaring thunder persist.

attributes.source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with the Thunder Manifestation

skills.name: Strifeful Lightning
skills.desc: Deals 3 <span style="color:#FFACFFFF">Electro DMG to the opposing character affected by <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Lightning Rod. (If there are no eligible opposing characters, deals DMG to the active character instead)

skills.name: Thundering Shackles
skills.desc: Deals 2 <span style="color:#FFACFFFF">Electro DMG, summons 1 <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Thundering Shackles.

skills.name: Lightning Probe
skills.desc: (Passive) When battle begins, create a <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Lightning Strike Probe on the opponent's side of the field.
